name: Cruize Finance
intro: Platform for managing downside price risks in crypto
introduce: Cruize is a decentralized protocol that enables capital-efficient asset hedging by tokenizing hedged asset positions. The protocol creates a structured workflow that combines perpetuals and debt strategies to make the hedging mechanism completely self-sufficient and inexpensive. Price pegged wrapped tokens called crTOKENs (ex - crETH for ETH) are minted for staked assets that have a dynamic price floor enforcing protection.
